line_1: And to Peace, and good Humour bid open Defiance.
line_2: Think Dressing of Dinner the Height of all Science,

line_1: The fop, with learning at defiance,
line_2: Scoffs at the pedant and the science:

line_1: Of net or gun, and bid defiance
line_2: Fell war, betake you to th' alliance

line_1: Set Sense and Learning at defiance;
line_2: But FLORIO knew the WORLD, that Science

line_1: To Grammar Rules we'll bid Defiance;
line_2: For Play will then become a Science.

line_1: And proudly gave a brave defiance
line_2: To Wit and Dulness in Alliance.

line_1: I bid thy cruel scythe defiance;
